message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, $20,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $12,000 at this time.  Let me know if that's something you're willing to work with.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $20,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $17,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  How about $14,000?  I'm really hoping we can reach an agreement.
